content.raw:
ODE doesn't have a function for returning the angle of the second axis. It only has dJointGetHinge2Angle1, though it does return the angular velocity of each axis with dJointGetHinge2Angle1Rate and dJointGetHinge2Angle2Rate. Gazebo currently uses all these functions, but ignores any requests for the angle of the second axis.

Bullet appears to have accessors for each angle of the hinge2 joint.

Perhaps we hack the ODE code to include dJointGetHinge2Angle2?

ODE doesn't have a function for returning the angle of the second axis. It only has dJointGetHinge2Angle1, though it does return the angular velocity of each axis with dJointGetHinge2Angle1Rate and dJointGetHinge2Angle2Rate. Gazebo currently uses all these functions, but ignores any requests for the angle of the second axis.

Bullet appears to have accessors for each angle of the hinge2 joint.

Perhaps we hack the ODE code to include dJointGetHinge2Angle2?
